name: Bunch Inc.
description: Provider of a topic-based platform designed to foster and encourage intellectual discussion. The company's topic-based platform helps people to engage in online conversations based on topics of common interest, enabling users to stay connected with other members and remain updated on their favorite topic.
one_liner: Provider of a topic-based platform designed to foster and encourage intellectual discussion.
